<a id="RDPipelineDepthStencilState"></a>

# RDPipelineDepthStencilState

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Pipeline depth/stencil state (used by [RenderingDevice](RenderingDevice.md)).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**RDPipelineDepthStencilState** controls the way depth and stencil comparisons are performed when sampling those values using [RenderingDevice](RenderingDevice.md).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_back_op_compare"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[CompareOperator](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_CompareOperator) **back_op_compare** = `7` [ðŸ”—](#RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_back_op_compare)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_back_op_compare**\ (\ value\: [CompareOperator](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_CompareOperator)\ )
- [CompareOperator](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_CompareOperator) **get_back_op_compare**\ (\ )

The method used for comparing the previous back stencil value and [back_op_reference](RDPipelineDepthStencilState.md#RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_back_op_reference).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_back_op_compare_mask"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **back_op_compare_mask** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_back_op_compare_mask)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_back_op_compare_mask**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_back_op_compare_mask**\ (\ )

Selects which bits from the back stencil value will be compared.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_back_op_depth_fail"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[StencilOperation](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_StencilOperation) **back_op_depth_fail** = `1` [ðŸ”—](#RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_back_op_depth_fail)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_back_op_depth_fail**\ (\ value\: [StencilOperation](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_StencilOperation)\ )
- [StencilOperation](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_StencilOperation) **get_back_op_depth_fail**\ (\ )

The operation to perform on the stencil buffer for back pixels that pass the stencil test but fail the depth test.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_back_op_fail"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

- [StencilOperation](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_StencilOperation) **get_back_op_fail**\ (\ )

The operation to perform on the stencil buffer for back pixels that fail the stencil test.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

The operation to perform on the stencil buffer for back pixels that pass the stencil test.

- [int](int.md) **get_back_op_reference**\ (\ )

The value the previous back stencil value will be compared to.

- [int](int.md) **get_back_op_write_mask**\ (\ )

Selects which bits from the back stencil value will be changed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_depth_compare_operator"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[CompareOperator](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_CompareOperator) **depth_compare_operator** = `7` [ðŸ”—](#RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_depth_compare_operator)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_depth_compare_operator**\ (\ value\: [CompareOperator](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_CompareOperator)\ )
- [CompareOperator](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_CompareOperator) **get_depth_compare_operator**\ (\ )

The method used for comparing the previous and current depth values.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_depth_range_max"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **depth_range_max** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_depth_range_max)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_depth_range_max**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_depth_range_max**\ (\ )

The maximum depth that returns ``true`` for [enable_depth_range](RDPipelineDepthStencilState.md#RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_enable_depth_range).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_depth_range_min"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **depth_range_min** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_depth_range_min)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_depth_range_min**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_depth_range_min**\ (\ )

The minimum depth that returns ``true`` for [enable_depth_range](RDPipelineDepthStencilState.md#RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_enable_depth_range).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_enable_depth_range"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **enable_depth_range** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_enable_depth_range)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_enable_depth_range**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_enable_depth_range**\ (\ )

If ``true``, each depth value will be tested to see if it is between [depth_range_min](RDPipelineDepthStencilState.md#RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_depth_range_min) and [depth_range_max](RDPipelineDepthStencilState.md#RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_depth_range_max). If it is outside of these values, it is discarded.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_enable_depth_test"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **enable_depth_test** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_enable_depth_test)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_enable_depth_test**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_enable_depth_test**\ (\ )

If ``true``, enables depth testing which allows objects to be automatically occluded by other objects based on their depth. This also allows objects to be partially occluded by other objects. If ``false``, objects will appear in the order they were drawn (like in Redot's 2D renderer).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_enable_depth_write"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **enable_depth_write** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_enable_depth_write)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_enable_depth_write**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_enable_depth_write**\ (\ )

If ``true``, writes to the depth buffer whenever the depth test returns ``true``. Only works when enable_depth_test is also ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_enable_stencil"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **enable_stencil** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_enable_stencil)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_enable_stencil**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_enable_stencil**\ (\ )

If ``true``, enables stencil testing. There are separate stencil buffers for front-facing triangles and back-facing triangles. See properties that begin with "front_op" and properties with "back_op" for each.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RDPipelineDepthStencilState_property_front_op_compare"></a>
